name: Escape the dungeon (MarcoDXV)
description:
Escape the Dungeon is a little PICO 8 game created for the Trijam #116 When the witch is on screen: "DON'T MOVE" if she see you it's game over but when she isn't on screen you can run away the jam theme:  Stay there, don't move! Controls:
  • RIGHT  and  LEFT to move
  • O to jump
Reach the door to go in the next level  Code:
  • Atom (Code editor)
  • PICO-8
  • Game coded by me
Pixel art:
  • Aseprite
  • PICO-8
  • Art made by me
Escape the Dungeon Enjoy !
